mapper.sql: id, parent_id, title, name, parent_title, level, component, path, icon, sort, creator, updater, create_time, update_time, hidden, del
mapper.select: SELECT pam.id, pam.parent_id, pam.title, pam.name, pam.parent_title, pam.level, pam.component, pam.path, pam.icon, pam.sort, pam.creator, pam.updater, pam.create_time, pam.update_time, pam.hidden, pam.del FROM pisces_auth_menu pam INNER JOIN pisces_auth_role_menu parm ON pam.id = parm.menu_id INNER JOIN pisces_auth_user_role paur ON parm.role_id = paur.role_id INNER JOIN pisces_auth_user pau ON paur.user_id = pau.id WHERE pau.del = '1' AND pau.id = #{userId}
